column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I wish I had one of these at home in Wisconsin.  I seriously have loved everything  I've gotten from this place so far!!!   The eggs
column3: turkey bacon?  Spectacular!  Pancakes??  Don't even get me started...FANTASTIC!!!   Today I tried the banana cream pie pancakes and let me tell you: tasted like REAL bananas
column4: real everything--so flavorful!!!   I don't even want to try any other breakfast place!  Robert
column6: is ridiculously nice!  Great recommendations and an all around cheerful guy.  The ladies at the front are super friendly and they look like they love their job.  I wish I could give this place more than 5 stars.  Will come back here every time I'm in Chicago!
